House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02487
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR LOCAL ABSENTEE VOTING FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITY
ABSTRACT : Seeks to grant persons with disability (PWDs) to avail of the local absentee voting to cast their votes for national elective positions in order to relieve them of the discomfort of having to jostle their way through crowded polling places.
